channel.title: AMP on Red Devil
channel.description: Recent content in AMP on Red Devil

item.title: Getting Started with AMP
item.description: Getting started with AMP ? Implement these key steps to get up and running with AMP: Create your AMP pages Validate your AMP pages Make your content discoverable Using AMP day-to-day Keep your AMP momentum going with all the resources AMP has to offer. Create your AMP pages See the relevant sections below for: using a CMS, starting from scratch, or converting existing content
